Service.Name: WMS
Service.Title: BRUGIS WMS INSPIRE ENG
Service.Abstract: Service mapping data visualization Brussels Urban Development for INSPIRE directive

ContactPersonPrimary.ContactOrganization: Bruxelles Développement urbain / Brussel Stedelijke Ontwikkeling

Service.AccessConstraints: No condition applies. Free use under the condition that the source and the latest revision date are mentioned.

inspire_common:Specification.inspire_common:Title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

inspire_common:MetadataPointOfContact.inspire_common:OrganisationName: Bruxelles Développement urbain / Brussel Stedelijke Ontwikkeling

inspire_common:Keyword.inspire_common:KeywordValue: Area management/restriction/regulation zones and reporting units

Layer.Title: GeoServer Web Map Service
Layer.Abstract: A compliant implementation of WMS plus most of the SLD extension (dynamic styling). Can also generate PDF, SVG, KML, GeoRSS

Layer.Name: INSPIRENL:Beschermde_Gehelen
Layer.Title: Registered complex
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region: "any group of properties forming an urban or rural unit sufficiently coherent to be the subject of a topographic and remarkable delimitation by its homogeneity or its integration in the landscape" having been the subject of a decree for its conservation

Layer.Name: INSPIRENL:Beschermde_archeologische_landschappen
Layer.Title: Registered archaeological site
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region : "any territory, geological formation, building, complex or site that includes or is likely to include archaeological goods" having been the subject of a decree for its conservation

Layer.Name: INSPIRENL:Beschermde_landschappen
Layer.Title: Registered site
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region : "any work of nature or man or any combined work of man and nature constituting a space with no or partial construction and showing space coherence" having been the subject of a decree for its conservation

Layer.Name: INSPIRENL:Beschermde_monumenten
Layer.Title: Registered monument
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region: "any particularly remarkable achievement, including the decorative installations or elements forming an integral part of this achievementԠhaving been the subject of a decree for its conservation

Layer.Name: INSPIREFR:Ensembles_classes
Layer.Title: Registered complex
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region: "any group of properties forming an urban or rural unit sufficiently coherent to be the subject of a topographic and remarkable delimitation by its homogeneity or its integration in the landscape" having been the subject of a decree for its conservation

Layer.Name: INSPIREEN:Green_areas_with_high_biological_value
Layer.Title: Green areas with high biological value
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region: areas intended for the conservation and the regeneration of a natural environment that is of high biological value as it shelters rare animal and vegetable species or boasts considerable biological diversity

Keyword.vocabulary: GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0 GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0

Layer.Name: INSPIREEN:Protection_area
Layer.Title: Protection area
Layer.Abstract: Brussels-Capital Region: "the area established around a monument, a unit, a landscape or an archaeological site whose perimeter is fixed according to the requirements of the protection of the surroundings of the heritage in question" having been the subject of a decree for its conservation
